plot: Sun-yeong strikes a man on a bicycle on her way home from work. Terrified, she flees the scene of the accident but is witnessed by Yeong-pyo who devises an ambitious blackmail scheme.
title: Taeyangsokui namja
plot_es: Sun-yeong strikes a man on a bicycle on her way home from work. Terrified, she flees the scene of the accident but is witnessed by Yeong-pyo who devises an ambitious blackmail scheme.
plot_en: Sun-yeong strikes a man on a bicycle on her way home from work. Terrified, she flees the scene of the accident but is witnessed by Yeong-pyo who devises an ambitious blackmail scheme.
